html:
• Home
  • Shopping

Good discounts come to those who shop late.

Photo: Courtesy of Launchmetric Spotlight

Good discounts come to those who shop late.

We know it's hard to find the right gifts for your loved ones, so we've compiled a ton of fashion and beauty-focused gift guides tailored to a range of interests and budgets. Check out our latest below and find more right here.

Sometimes, being an eleventh-hour shopper has its advantages: Fashion and beauty brands continue to host major sales, often deepening discounts as their shipping deadlines inch closer.

The key is knowing where to look — and trust, here at Fashionista, we know where to look. This season, our favorite labels and retailers have plenty to offer the last-minute shoppers looking to beat the "bad gift giver" allegations. We've sourced a stellar lineup of chic winter accessories, skin-care tools, travel essentials and beauty gift sets that are sure to delight — and happen to be heavily discounted at the moment. 

So close those computer tabs and spare that trip to Target. Our selects have at least a few days left until their holiday shipping deadlines and are almost all priced below $300. Shop them all below.
